title: Bridging Physical and Digital Worlds: When Your Body Is Your Tool, Data Becomes Accessible
abstract: New interaction models developed at University of Maryland and University of Manitoba utilize body and hand movement to perform data analysis on large wall-sized displays.
name: proxemiclens

title: Back to the Future: Exploring Multiple Futures in the Stock Market
abstract: A new tool called TimeFork uses interactive graphics and state-of-the-art statistical models to allow traders to investigate multiple parallel universes for predicting the stock market.
name: timefork

title: Yay, CHI 2018 acceptance and honorable mention award (top 5%)!

abstract: Presented a workshop paper on affordances of input modalities for visual exploration
